55-year-old.context: The patient is a 55-year-old female who has had chronic nasal obstruction secondary to nasal polyps and chronic sinusitis.

septal deviation.context: She also has a septal deviation mid posterior to the left compromising greater than 70% of her nasal airway.

left chronic anterior and posterior ethm.context: 1. Left chronic anterior and posterior ethmoiditis.

left chronic maxillary sinusitis with po.context: 2. Left chronic maxillary sinusitis with polyps.

right anterior and posterior chronic eth.context: 4. Right anterior and posterior chronic ethmoiditis.

right chronic maxillary sinusitis with p.context: 5. Right chronic maxillary sinusitis with polyps.

intranasal deformity causing nasal obstr.context: 7. Intranasal deformity causing nasal obstruction due to septal deviation.

bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

left anterior and posterior ethmoidectom.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

left maxillary antrostomy with polyp rem.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

left inferior partial turbinectomy.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

right anterior and posterior ethmoidecto.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

right partial inferior turbinectomy.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

septoplasty.context: Bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery, including left anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, left maxillary antrostomy with polyp removal, left inferior partial turbinectomy, right anterior and posterior ethmoidectomy, right maxillary antrostomy and polyp removal, right partial inferior turbinectomy, and septoplasty.

Lidocaine 1% with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: Lidocaine 1% with 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into the region of the anterior portion of the nasal septum.

polyps.context: The polyps were removed using the Richards essential shaver to help identify the middle turbinate and uncinate process better.

edematous sinus linings.context: The sinus linings were edematous but did not have any polyps in the inferior, lateral, or superior aspects.

mucosal disease.context: Bright mucosal disease and small polypoid accumulations were noted through the sinuses also.

polypoid accumulations.context: Bright mucosal disease and small polypoid accumulations were noted through the sinuses also.

inferior turbinate hypertrophy.context: The inferior turbinates had some polypoid changes on them also and showed marked mucosal irritation and hypertrophy.

Gelfilm packing.context: A thorough irrigation was then carried out in the nasal cavity, and Gelfilm packing was used to coat the linings in the middle meatal regions.
